description: Chateau owner Kurt Houston unlocks the mystery of his house with a flickering candle; he makes his way up to the attic.  The light flickers and blows out...but when the match is lit again, Randy Mixer stands before him.  They embrace.  Knowing they were meant to be together, yet separated by time, they quickly begin their hot fuck session, not knowing how long it can last.  Kurt bends over and grabs his ankles, preparing himself for a mighty blow of the mammoth shaft of the ghost.  One thing's for sure - it's a case of pure sex and possession!
title: Possession, Scene #05
